mapper.sql: id, stage, member_id AS memberId, user_id AS userId, label_id_arr AS labelIdArr, curr_record_id AS currRecordId, remind_record_id AS remindRecordId, create_date AS createDate, modify_date AS modifyDate, phase_status AS phaseStatus, tips
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM dj_member_customer WHERE 1=1
and member_id=#{memberId}
ORDER by create_date desc limit 1

SELECT c.id as clueId, mc.id as mcId, mc.member_id as memberId, mc.user_id as userId, c.owername as name, c.phone, c.wechat, mc.modify_date AS modifyDate, mc.create_date AS createDate, mc.label_id_arr AS labelIdArr, mc.phase_status as phaseStatus FROM dj_member_customer mc INNER join dj_clue c ON mc.member_id=c.member_id and mc.user_id=c.cus_service WHERE mc.user_id=#{userId} AND mc.data_status=0
AND CONCAT(c.owername,c.phone) like CONCAT('%',#{searchKey},'%')
ORDER by mc.create_date
desc

SELECT c.id as clueId, mc.id as customerId, h.id as houseId, if(m.name is not null,m.nick_name,m.name) as name, h.create_date AS createDate, h.visit_state as visitState, mc.user_id as userId, mc.member_id as memberId, mc.phase_status as phaseStatus FROM dj_member_customer mc INNER JOIN dj_clue c on mc.member_id=c.member_id and mc.user_id=c.cus_service INNER JOIN dj_member m on mc.member_id=m.id INNER JOIN dj_house h on m.id=h.member_id where h.visit_state=0 and c.store_id=#{storeId} and h.is_rob_stats=#{robStats} order By h.create_date desc
select type from dj_store_users where user_id in (select user_id from dj_member_customer mc where mc.member_id = #{memberId}) limit 1
select label_id_arr as labelIdArr from dj_member_customer mc where mc.id = #{mcId}
select label_id as labelId from dj_clue c where c.id = #{clueId}
select type from dj_store_users where user_id = #{userId} and data_status=0
select * from dj_member_customer mc inner join dj_clue c on mc.member_id=c.member_id and c.cus_service=mc.user_id where c.phone=#{mobile}
SELECT u.member_id as memberId,u.id as userId FROM dj_member_customer mc INNER JOIN dj_user u ON u.id = mc.user_id WHERE mc.member_id =#{memberId} GROUP BY u.member_id
SELECT count(0) FROM dj_member_customer mc INNER join dj_member m ON mc.member_id=m.id WHERE user_id=#{userId} AND mc.data_status=0 AND stage IN(0,1) AND tips = 1
